message:
There is no clean way to do this. There are a number of hacks, but each one has different pitfalls, and none work in every scenario.

The *proper* way to solve this is to update the old code. However, if you need a hack, I describe them here: [https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/magazine/mt238404.aspx](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/magazine/mt238404.aspx)
